summary.description: A Comprehensive Method Characterizing Protein-Protein Interactions of Fusion Proteins | A RESOURCE FOR FUSION PROTEINS AND THEIR INTERACTIONS | Milana Frenkel-Morgenstern's Cancer Genomics and BioComputing Lab at Bar-Ilan University, Israel | Result for the search by Unspecified: | Lars Juhl Jensen's Cellular Network Biology Group at The Novo Nordisk Foundation Center for Protein Research, University of Copenhagen, Denmark | ProtFus is a resource that has information about fusion proteins and their interactions, based on a text mining approach. "Tagging" is a process of registering the mention of given entities in a particular document | Text mining has been an active research topic for decades; however, it is only fairly recently that biomedical text-mining tools have been developed that make it practically applicable to a wide range of problems
summary.name: ProtFus
